byline.original: By HENRY N. DORRIS Special to THE YORK TIMES

abstract: Civil functions bill: Sen subcom adds funds
snippet: WASHINGTON, April 1.--A drive to stampede Congress into voting up to half a billion dollars more for relief was described today as having grown to tremendous proportions and was accompanied by such allegedly exaggerated reports ......

headline.main: HALF BILLION RISE IN RELIEF FUNDS URGED ON CONGRESS; STAMPEDE THE AIM Tales of Huge Slash in Relief Rolls Denied by WPA Itself HEARINGS ON BILL START Four Demands Made in House for New Outlay as Pressure on Members Increases

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 1.--A drive to stampede Congress into voting up to half a billion dollars more for relief was described today as having grown to tremendous proportions and was accompanied by such allegedly exaggerated reports ...
